block.p: COMMERCIAL BANK OF NEW YORK, has agreed to acquire Mizrahi Bank and Trust Co., a bank holding company in Israel, for undisclosed terms.
COMMERCIAL BANK OF NEW YORK, has agreed to acquire Mizrahi Bank and Trust Co., a bank holding company in Israel, for undisclosed terms.

IMC-AGRICO CO., a joint venture of IMC Global Inc. and Freeport-McMoran Resource Partners that makes phosphate rock and phosphate-based crop nutrients, said it would temporarily suspend production at its plant in Nichols, Fla.

A brief report in the Company News column of Business Day on Wednesday about a planned acquisition by the Commercial Bank of New York misidentified the company to be acquired. It is United Mizrahi Bank and Trust Company, a New York-based unit of United Mizrahi Bank, an Israeli bank holding company; it is not the Israeli company itself.

A brief report in the Company News column of Business Day on Wednesday about a planned acquisition by the Commercial Bank of New York misidentified the company to be acquired. It is United Mizrahi Bank and Trust Company, a New York-based unit of United Mizrahi Bank, an Israeli bank holding company; it is not the Israeli company itself.

Correction:

A brief report in the Company News column of Business Day on Wednesday about a planned acquisition by the Commercial Bank of New York misidentified the company to be acquired. It is United Mizrahi Bank and Trust Company, a New York-based unit of United Mizrahi Bank, an Israeli bank holding company; it is not the Israeli company itself.

It is United Mizrahi Bank and Trust Company, a New York-based unit of United Mizrahi Bank, an Israeli bank holding company; it is not the Israeli company itself.
